other_title: The Three Musketeers: Adventure of Aramis
アニメ三銃士 アラミスの冒険 (Japanese)
plot: The musketeers help a damsel in distress, but unfortunately she is found dead the following day. D'Artagnan is arrested as prime suspect since he was the last one seen with the lady. Investigating the murder reveals that the crime is not only connected to Aramis's past, but to the French monarchy itself.
